title: GroupManager插件的问题！
author: sa1402189438
txt_content:
GroupManager插件总是不读配置文件里的东西，后台报错如下：

14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - SEVERE - ===================================================
14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - SEVERE - = ERROR REPORT ENDED =
14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - SEVERE - ===================================================
14.06 17:47:35 [Server] INFO plugins\GroupManager\worlds\spawn\groups.yml
14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - SEVERE - The following file couldn't pass on Parser.
14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - SEVERE - ===================================================
14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - SEVERE - = GROUPMANAGER FOLDER TO AN ESSENTIALS  DEVELOPER =
14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - SEVERE - === PLEASE COPY AND PASTE THE ERROR.LOG FROM THE ==
14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - SEVERE - ===================================================

14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - SEVERE - ===================================================
14.06 17:47:35 [Server] WARN GroupManager - WARNING - There is no group Moderator, as stated for player ElgarL: Set to 'Builder' for file: plugins\GroupManager\worlds\world\users.yml复制代码下面是配置文件：
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

replies.author: sa1402189438
replies.txt_content:
再加一段错误代码！大神求帮忙看看

replies.author: sa1402189438
replies.txt_content:
Stagnate_小萌 发表于 2015-6-14 19:22
删掉重新装一个插件！
那请把你看懂的信息告诉我一下

replies.author: sa1402189438
replies.txt_content: 求解求解求解求解求解求解
需要我的给你么，不过需要重新添加一下权限

replies.author: Stagnate_小萌
replies.txt_content:
sa1402189438 发表于 2015-6-14 20:28
那请把你看懂的信息告诉我一下
这些没什么好看的，只要你会指令什么都不困难，会这些插件主要的权限就可以了！
